function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccessibility of psychological interventions in some regions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited financial resources and low access to comprehensive health care in lmics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to comprehensive information due to language and search engine restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty and unpredictability of the future of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authors in close contact during manuscript drafting","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection and reanalysis of clinical data by multiple authors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact, respiratory droplets, fomites, and contaminated surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission through airborne particles with diameters smaller than 5 μm","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Involvement of building environment and human behavior in the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Finger contact with virus-contaminated surfaces fomites and subsequent contact with facial membranes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of the virus carried in airborne particles from cough or vocalization","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Droplet spray onto facial membranes from cough or vocalization","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in cruise ship rooms up to 17 days after vacated","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Persistence of sars-cov-2 in aerosols in different environmental conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in stability of sars-cov-2 based on temperature and humidity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 remaining viable and infectious in aerosols for hours","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 persisting on surfaces for up to 4 days at room temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus inactivation time reduced dramatically with an increase in incubation temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survivability of sars-cov-2 on different surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short survival of sars-cov-1 and sars-cov-2 on copper surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable persistence of sars-cov-2 on porous surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability enhanced by bovine serum albumin, increasing potential for fomite transmission in indoor environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 can remain infectious on surfaces for 1-7 days, potentially leading to surface-based transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 in specific medical procedures, increasing the risk of airborne infection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Claimed risk of short-and medium-range person-to-person distance in aerosol transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relative contributions of different influenza virus exposure pathways","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of indoor airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear role of airborne particles in virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of virus by asymptomatic individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide range of droplet sizes emitted during speaking and coughing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of particle emission during vocalization and breathing activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in discriminating between airborne transmission and transmission through respiratory droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in aerosols in hospital environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investigating size distribution of airborne sars-cov-2 droplets in a specific location during the covid-19 outbreak.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of virus-laden aerosols from the surface of protective apparel worn by medical staff.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of particle matter from walking events in indoor spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspension of bioaerosols and virus particles in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative data for defining environmental control measures against covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Outbreaks of covid-19 linked to common indoor environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the restaurant led to the spread of covid-19 through aerosol transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection rates in a call center in seoul, south korea, due to close proximity and potential aerosol transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in a crowded workplace environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High secondary infection rate in choir practice","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infection in meat-processing plant","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in a meat-processing plant due to poor ventilation and crowded environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through the air at a distance of 2m or more in a confined and crowded environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Control of infectious aerosols by ventilation, filtration, and uv germicidal irradiation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of sars-cov-2 aerosols in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of short-range transmission of small droplets","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of aerosols up to 10 μm in diameter indoors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
